title: [Rumor Woods]
description: Sunlight filters through the snow-dappled branches of the massive firs and spruces towering over this portion of the path, casting the forest floor in gold and shadow.  High above, a loud hoot followed by snow falling from a branch announces an owl taking its new perch.

Moonlight filters through the snow-dappled branches of the massive firs and spruces towering over this portion of the path, casting the forest floor in silver and shadow.  High above, a loud hoot followed by snow falling from a branch announces an owl taking its new perch.
